_sText:
My deathrun map. For those, who donÂ´t know what deathrun is:
In deathrun, counter-terrorists try to get to the end of the map. Terrorists are trying to stop counter-terrorists by launching traps (crushers, lasers, etc.)

The traps are:

Room 1:
Lowering Bridge

Hallway 1:
None

Room 2:
Breakable floor
Anti-gravity platforms
A hammer

Hallway 2:
Lasers
Crusher
Breakable floor (with a ramp dropping)

Room 3:
Fast Crusher

Hallway 3:
Explosives
Spinning bridge

Hope you like it!
